crystalline_brain.name: Crystalline Brain

impure.name: Impure Crystalline Brain
impure.effect: +20% Spell Damage, Casts random spells periodically

purified.name: Purified Crystalline Brain
purified.effect: +20% Spell Damage, Major spell attacks, Arcane Overload

crystalline_brain.flavorText: The mind crystallized, processing magic as thought.

composite_pupils.name: Composite Pupils

refined.name: Refined Composite Pupils
refined.effect: +25% Critical Hit Chance, +30% Critical Damage, Tri-beam attack

purified.name: Purified Composite Pupils
purified.effect: +25% Critical Hit Chance, +30% Critical Damage, Ocular Storm, Omniscient

composite_pupils.flavorText: A thousand eyes, each seeing a different truth.

hypermetabolic_heart.name: Hypermetabolic Heart

refined.effect: +15% Attack/Cast Speed, +10% Movement Speed, Triple Dash

purified.name: Purified Hypermetabolic Heart
purified.effect: +15% Attack/Cast Speed, +10% Movement Speed, Hyperdash Flurry, Metabolic Overdrive

hypermetabolic_heart.flavorText: It beats so fast it hums like a hummingbird's wings.

basal_liver.name: Basal Liver

purified.name: Purified Basal Liver
purified.effect: +30% Chaos Resistance, Inflicts Poison, Septic Cloud, Toxin Recycler

basal_liver.flavorText: It filters out everything. Including mercy.

fractal_lungs.name: Fractal Lungs

refined.name: Refined Fractal Lungs
refined.effect: +20% Elemental Damage, Breath weapon, Elemental ground effects

purified.name: Purified Fractal Lungs
purified.effect: +20% Elemental Damage, Dual element breath, Elemental Conflux, Adaptive Respiration

fractal_lungs.flavorText: Each breath splits into infinite branches of possibility.

noxious_bladder.name: Noxious Bladder

refined.effect: 10% Chaos DoT aura, Applies Erosion, Vents Bile

purified.name: Purified Noxious Bladder
purified.effect: 10% Chaos DoT aura, Applies Erosion, Miasma Orbs, Toxic Buildup

noxious_bladder.flavorText: The stench alone is a weapon.

prismatic_bones.name: Prismatic Bones

refined.name: Refined Prismatic Bones
refined.effect: +50% Armour, Reflects 15% Physical Damage, Bone Armor

purified.name: Purified Prismatic Bones
purified.effect: +50% Armour, Reflects 25% Physical Damage, Prismatic Shatter, Calcified Wrath

prismatic_bones.flavorText: Bones that bend light and break steel.

unstable_muscles.name: Unstable Muscles

refined.name: Refined Unstable Muscles
refined.effect: +30% Physical Damage, Causes Bleeding, Tremor Slam

purified.name: Purified Unstable Muscles
purified.effect: +30% Physical Damage, Causes Bleeding, Seismic Detonation, Muscle Fury

unstable_muscles.flavorText: Fiber bundles coiled tighter than steel springs.

sanctified_tissue.name: Sanctified Tissue
sanctified_tissue.description: Unique endgame organ with divine properties

unique.name: Sanctified Tissue
unique.effect: Regenerates 5% Life/sec, Cannot Die (once at 30% HP for 10s)

sanctified_tissue.flavorText: Divinity interrupted leaves flesh forever reaching for transcendence. The cells remember what they almost became.

engorged_amygdala.name: Engorged Amygdala
engorged_amygdala.description: Unique endgame organ with psychic properties

unique.name: Engorged Amygdala
unique.effect: Spawns Chaos explosions on hit, Deals 50% of damage as extra Chaos

engorged_amygdala.flavorText: The brain swelled to comprehend truths no mortal mind should hold. Now it whispers in languages which delight Chaos itself.

eldritch_mesentery.name: Eldritch Mesentery
eldritch_mesentery.description: Unique endgame organ with Beyond properties
eldritch_mesentery.flavorText: A gift the stars did not ask consent to give. The Devourer's hunger coils in borrowed flesh, patient and eternal.

caged_trophy.name: Caged Trophy
caged_trophy.description: A specimen captured during the Great Hunt
caged_trophy.effect: Used to construct Test Subjects and unlock crafting recipes

scaling.itemLevel: Determines Test Subject's item level for drops

caged_trophy.dropSource: Dropped by Playmates (special rare monsters in Great Hunt maps)
caged_trophy.flavorText: The beast caged. The hunt successful. What remains is potential.
